text:
• Paper & Electronic 125000024
• Wires 026009593
I admit I am struggling, knowing you freely say you lied to me for 30 years. That is most of my life, and I have to start all over now. And I still
can't get you to even work with me on rebuilding and being civil—even for the kid's sake.
I have asked every way I know how. I know you have a lot of anger, but you slept on the pillow next to me for 25 years and talked about
growing old together. But every night was a lie. Our whole life was a lie. It's hard to ignore.
I still really wish we would get some help. This way has NOT worked—ever since 2023. Every day that passes under your plan makes it worse,
and the only thing you do is double down. It's like you want to torment me at this stage.
I should know just to quit askingm but I feel like I have to at least try for the kid's sake.
On 12/28/2024 at 10:53 AM, Robert Moyer wrote:
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: Never)
Subject:Re: Seahawks ticket sale
I am going to ask that you not start deducting things for me unilaterally. Please deposit the amount that I am owed and I will handle my
financial affairs. You are not my accountant anymore. Thanks.
On 12/28/2024 at 10:36 AM, Christine Moyer wrote:
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/28/2024 at 10:49 AM)
Subject:Seahawks ticket sale
Attachments:IMG_2775.PNG (205 KB)
Tickets sold and received 444.23 after commission for last Seahawks game.
I’ll deduct $100 for your share of the gardener and transfer the balance of 122.3 to you for your half.
Can you send me you BofA details?
Message 278 of 287
Please share with your therapist and Cimberleigh and perhaps they can provide feedback directly.
I dont feel comfortable doing that directly with you.
In discussions with her she had not received Connor’s report yet per pp. Has Luis?
Sent:12/28/2024 at 04:06 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/28/2024 at 04:06 PM)
Subject:Re: AD is asleep
On 12/28/2024 at 03:50 PM, Robert Moyer wrote:
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/28/2024 at 04:00 PM)
Subject:Re: AD is asleep
I don’t know what my jab was but if there was one, please point it out so I don’t do it again and accept my apologies. The issues I noted below
are real to me and I still don’t see a response. I am frustrated that we can’t work together after our last discussion. I sincerely hoped we would
make peace.
